astakhdim Console API

ma 'iidha kan sayatimu astikhdam Console API limash alnasi 'aw astikhdam tasalsul mash al'astur al'asrae VT. 'iidha kan khataan , fasatustakhdam Marquee tasalsul VT almunasibu. wa'iilaa , fasayustakhdim wajihat barmajat tatbiqat wahdat altahakum alati rubama takun 'abta'u.
